item.title: 09 Aug 2021 10:36
item.description:
A quick jog down the lesser known streets of chennai in search of the cleaner sections of the Adyar river. This one’s by the Thiru vi ka bridge just before the Adyar river meets the Bay of Bengal. Should probably get my Kayak and explore these waters. https://t.co/bxgqIDuSd0

Link to Tweet
